item.description:
The topic of this event is how to attract your ultimate client. We'll talk about how to create a memorable customer experience, the simplest way to create an effective information product and how to use your time, money and energy most effectively in marketing.

The Marketing Cafe™ is the online radio show that features simple, yet highly effective ideas for solopreneurs and small business owners like you who want to make a good living while making a difference in the world.

Get Access Info here: http://wp.me/P29Qf9-rr

Date: Thursday, October 11, 2012

Time: 12 noon Eastern Time
(48 hour replay available if your schedule doesn't cooperate).

The featured guest speaker is Judy Murdoch, Guerrilla Marketing Coach and Consultant. Judy is a true Guerrilla Marketer. For over 30 years, she has learned and taught the mindset of what makes people buy. Many of us know the phrase 'People buy from someone they Know, Like and Trust.' Judy takes this one step further and helps businesses be smarter, more creative, and more resourceful to stand out in the marketplace.

Your host is marketing results coach Mark Reinert, founder of Authentic Business Growth, LLC and the creator of the Business Growth Dojo™ the definitive business incubator for independent professionals and owners of small service-based businesses.

Get Access Info here: http://wp.me/P29Qf9-rr

During this program you will learn:

  • How elevator speeches can hurt your business (and what to do instead).
  • The simplest way to create an effective information product.
  • Why the standard advice 'just get out there' to get more clients doesn't work.
  • What marketing actions are best for small business owners when they want to get new clients and customers.
  • How you can create the ultimate client experience
  • An old strategy with a new twist which is one of the most effective strategies you can use to make your small business stand out above your competition.
  • How to avoid wasting time, money and energy when creating information products.

Get Access Info here: http://wp.me/P29Qf9-rr
item.name: How to Attract the Ultimate Client
